title: nurse
body:
N: Who are you?
-> I'm with the police
	N: He isn't feeling well enough for an interrogation detective, come back later.
-> I'm his friend
	N: Immediate family only. Come back later.
-> I'm his brother
	N:Can I see ID?
    <<if $haveID is true>>
        ->Show ID
            N:Go on in then.
            //player should be able to access the husband's room while he is awake
    <<else>>
        ->I don't have ID
            N:I can't let you in without ID.
    <<endif>>
